help:
☎️☎️☎️
Starting a WhatsApp chat usually requires a contact. 

Now you can start a chat by just sending the number to Fredo and clicking the link you get back. 

💡 Tip: Make sure you include country code for numbers outside your country code. 

 *Examples:* 
 _+972507779955_
 _+1 212 666 8899_ 

_Send *HELP* to return to main menu._
